Name: Rusty Daiquiri
Ingredients: 50 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Review: Rich herbal, honeyed notes add a Scottish dimension to the classic Cuban cocktail.
History: Created in December 2010 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Rusty Daiquiri contains 172 calories
